dict.string: If you ever want to see this tutorial again, just tap the question mark on the front page.
Make A Meal Of It Tutorial
Just type in the recipe you want.
Sometime you want a specific ingredient, and sometimes you want any recipe without that ingredient. Slide right to include, and left to exclude, an ingredient from the search.

Wheels can be rotated and the currently selected item can be included or excluded from the search. Maybe you want a gluten-free recipe, or perhaps you really don't want breakfast recipes. The power is there.
Respect Allergies or Diets. Specify Courses, Cuisines and Holidays
